enum.name: MAV_MISSION_STATE
enum.description: Type of mission items being requested/sent in mission protocol.

entry.name: MAV_MISSION_CURRENT
entry.description: Items are mission commands for main auto mission and are received via the autopilot and aircraft module.

entry.name: MAV_MISSION_ONBOARD
entry.description: Items are mission ready and have been acknowledged by the aircraft module for processing.

entry.name: MAV_MISSION_PROPOSED
entry.description: Items are mission ready but have been generated by a module not related to the aircraft and need to be pushed towards the appropriate aircraft module.

entry.name: MAV_MISSION_RECEIVED
entry.description: Items have been distributed and received by the appropriate MACE instance connected to the associated module. They however have yet to be marked as current or onboard. Often this state is reflected via communication between external link modules.

entry.name: MAV_MISSION_OUTDATED
entry.description: Items were once relevant to the system have been since replaced with newer current missions.

message.name: NEW_ONBOARD_MISSION
message.description: This message is emitted currently under one circumstances. A vehicle may emit this when its local planners have developed a new mission for the vehicle and have updated one of its queues. The count of the mission items in this queue is sent as its more direct method of enabling other mace instances for transmission

message.name: REQUEST_HOME_POSITION
message.description: The home position relating to the mission of the target system has been requested.
message.field: The system which the home position is being requested from.

message.name: HOME_POSITION_ACK
message.description: An acknowledgement of setting the home position.
message.field: Acknowledgement of the home position set request.

message.name: GUIDED_TARGET_STATS
message.description: Message containing stats relating to the aircrafts perception of a current target position along a trajectory and its distance.
message.field: X position of this position in the defined coordinate frame.
Y position of this position in the defined coordinate frame.
Z position of this position in the defined coordinate frame.
Relative distance away the system is from the target location.
Coordinate frame of the position vector. This field is as related to the MAV_FRAME definition.
Current state of the controller in pursuit of the guided state.
